mapper.select: SELECT c.chat_date,c.chat_side,c.chat_content,c.enable FROM user_chat uc LEFT JOIN chat c ON uc.chat_id = c.chat_id WHERE user_id = #{userID} AND c.deleted = 0
SELECT c.chat_date,c.chat_side,c.chat_content,c.enable FROM user_chat uc LEFT JOIN chat c ON uc.chat_id = c.chat_id WHERE c.chat_id = #{chatID} AND user_id = #{userID} AND c.deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT c.chat_content,uc.temperature,uc.top_p,uc.presence_penalty,uc.frequency_penalty,uc.model,uc.usage_prompt_tokens,uc.usage_completion_tokens,uc.usage_total_tokens,c.id,uc.chat_id FROM user_chat uc LEFT JOIN chat c ON uc.chat_id = c.chat_id WHERE c.chat_id = #{chatID} AND user_id = #{userID} AND c.deleted = 0 AND c.chat_side = "system"
SELECT uc.title,uc.chat_id FROM user_chat uc WHERE uc.user_id = #{userID}
